cholars crowns were enchanted circlets used in the 15 century DR.
These metal circlets shimmered and vibrated with a perpetual subdued hum. When worn, they somewhat invigorated and energized the wearer.
In the late 15 century DR, scholars crowns were in wide use across the Sword Coast North area, namely the Sword Mountains, the city of Neverwinter and its markets, and among goblins and kobolds of the Neverwinter Wood.
